page.title: 08MOSS BANK PARK BOLTON
page.content: Moss Bank Park is a large park near school.There are a lot of things that are free.There is the Rock Garden,the English Garden,the kiddies playground, sandpit,benches and grass for playing on.People walk their dogs in the park.There is also an animal corner. There are things that are organised like bowls,tennis, pitch and putt, cricket,football and rounders.Other things happen occasionally such as fun runs,fairs, family fun days,brass bands and charity races.There is a community centre,a lunch club for elderly,a snack bar,several ice-cream vans, roundabouts,swingboats, inflatable bouncy castle,a small train,a pony and trap and grass sledging.Away from all of this is an open air theatre where they have concerts.
